name: Risk of Fairies
description:
An entry for the Touhou Game Jam 6, themed around "Combos"

Join Marisa, and optionally a second online Marisa to explore progressive layers of the fairy infested forest, picking up Yokai-treasures as you venture through progressively more challenging layers.

Gameplay:
Seek out the red crystal for each level to summon the boss, or fight the continuously spawning fairies to save up money for treasure chests. 

Activate found equipment with Q, blast nearby enemies with M2, and use Shift to dash away quickly to get out of a tight spot!

In multiplayer, if you die, you revive when your team mate clears the level.

The game has no definitive ending, there are three bosses. Once you've encountered Kisume you can consider yourself victorious.

Touhou is owned by ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice, thank you for your permissive licensing.
